title: I Need Job!! - Unofficial Decision for You, vol. 1
description: Life is certainly not a bed of roses for Yuri Asaoka, a fourth-year university student. She went to countless job interviews and is always rejected. On her 50th interview, she met Ryoji Manabe, a famous student in her university. Yuri did gave a bad first impression but did she deserve such horrible treatment? What will happen when she started to fall for the cool Manabe. The fist book on hardship of looking for a job and chasing an elusive love...
author: Aki Yoshino
